atmosphere_notes: Resolution. 18-year time-skip shows long-term success. Three variants thriving in chosen environments. Generational perspective shifts from loss (first) to different (second) to normal (third). Mira and Chen represent shelter-Marsborn evolution. Completed Mars as neither-Earth-nor-Mars, new equilibrium. Shepherd's continued existence and unknown lifespan. Kessa-pattern's complex satisfaction—grief and joy intertwined. Zero enforcement deaths for 18 years proves cooperation sustainable. Constitutional frameworks enable continuation beyond Shepherd. Cultural integration happening organically. Diversity as strength. Plurality over purity. Bittersweet triumph: individuals lost (Kessa), collectives saved (83,590). Legacy honored. Work continues. Not ending but continuation. Tone: reflective, satisfied, bittersweet, hopeful, open-ended.
